item.title: Ender's Game
item.description: ##16:23 Tuesday 06 January 2015 JST## Just watched Ender’s Game on DVD. It was a pretty good story, which I guess isn’t too hard when it’s based on a really good book. I teared up a bit when Sergeant Dap saluted to Ender for the first time.
